Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus haemolyticus (MIC=6.25-12.5 µM), Aerococcus viridans (MIC=0.19-0.39 µM), Micrococcus luteus (MIC=0.39-0.78 µM), Bacillus subtilis (MIC=6.25-12.5 µM);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli 363 (MIC>50 µM), Aeromonas hydrophila (MIC>50 µM), V. harveyi (MIC=0.78-1.56 µM), Vibrio anguillarum (MIC=3.125-6.25 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Comments: No comments found on DRAMP database

Literature.Title: Two novel antimicrobial peptides, arasin-likeSp and GRPSp, from the mud crab Scylla paramamosain, exhibit the activity against some crustacean pathogenic bacteria.
Literature.Author: Imjongjirak C, Amparyup P, Tassanakajon A.
